text: Enantiophoenix is a genus of enantiornithine birds. Fossil remains were recovered from Lebanon. Lumps of amber preserved with one specimen indicate it may have fed on tree sap. ==References== Category:Extinct birds of Asia Category:Bird genera Category:Late Cretaceous birds of Asia Category:Avisauridae Category:Fossil taxa described in 2008 Category:Fossils of Lebanon
title: Enantiophoenix
